author: USA TODAY
title: 7 ridiculous stats from Booker's 70-point game
text:
7 ridiculous stats from Booker's 70-point game Devin Booker made history. Post to Facebook 7 ridiculous stats from Booker's 70-point game Devin Booker made history.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/03/devin-booker-phoenix-suns-70-points-stats-crazy-history-records   7 ridiculous stats from Booker's 70-point game Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 12:38   
Devin Booker scored a phenomenal 70 points in the Suns' loss to the Celtics on Friday night at TD Garden - a 20-year-old dropped 70. Many players around the NBA tweeted in shock, and the Suns celebrated in the locker room afterwards , even though they just lost the game, 130-120. Earl Watson unapologetic about using fouls and timeouts to aid Booker's 70 point night. Watson: "Do something about it." â€” Chris Forsberg (@ESPNForsberg) March 25, 2017 
By scoring 70, Booker broke some records and placed himself among some greats in NBA history, and again, he's 20 - he's not even old enough to buy alcohol in the U.S. A night to remember. 
Here are seven crazy stats: 1. Broke the franchise record Devin Booker broke Suns record for points in a game. Tom Chambers previously held that record with 60 in March 1990 against SuperSonics â€” ESPN Stats & Info (@ESPNStatsInfo) March 25, 2017 2. Did it as the youngest player at 20 years old Devin Booker is the youngest player to score at least 60 points in a game (age 20) â€” ESPN Stats & Info (@ESPNStatsInfo) March 25, 2017 3. Only the 11th time in NBA HISTORY a player has pulled this off Devin Booker ( @Suns ): 11th 70-point game in NBA history.First since Kobe Bryant scored 81 points vs Raptors in 2006 pic.twitter.com/GFBq7WTpLl â€” ESPN Stats & Info (@ESPNStatsInfo) March 25, 2017 4. Most points EVER scored vs. Celtics Devin Booker's 70 points for @Suns are the most in a game against the Celtics. pic.twitter.com/V4zvkbD7jp â€” ESPN Stats & Info (@ESPNStatsInfo) March 25, 2017 5. Most points scored in a game in the NBA since Kobe's 81 Suns' Devin Booker finishes w/ franchise-record 70 points vs. Celtics, most in NBA since Lakers' Kobe Bryant had 81 vs. Raptors on 1/22/2006 â€” Ben Golliver (@BenGolliver) March 25, 2017 6. Devin Booker has been added to a short list that includes these guys Players who have scored 70+ PTS in @NBA history:ðŸ”¸Wilt Chamberlain
